amendatorysection.catchline: Work and education programs; department; report.
amendatorysection.para: The Department of Health and Human Services shall submit electronically an annual report, not later than February 1 of each year, to the Legislature regarding the effectiveness of programs established pursuant to subdivision (5)(a) of section 43-512. The report shall include, but not be limited to:
(3) Supportive services provided to participants in the program;
(5) A cost and benefit statement for the program.
